enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
sentences: Richard Kinley noted questions about the participation of observers in the COP/MOP.
AUSTRALIA noted its submission asserting serious inaccuracies in the Secretariat's Note (FCCC/SBI/2006/2, paragraphs 32-33).
The US said the status of parties to the UNFCCC but not the Protocol was clear under Protocol Articles 13.2 and 15.2.
